recipesJson.name: BERRIES BANANA
recipesJson.author: VapinTrucker
recipesJson.description:
As mixed on DIYDOWNUNDER. 

https://youtu.be/SzPFXklM40g

A simple yet delicious vape. Only three flavors yall. 

The banana combo here has quickly become my goto for bananas. These two together makes a great creamy banana not too candy not too real either. No runty flavor for me out of thus combo. 

Forest fruit. Enough said. Mixed berries

reviews.text: I have vaped a banana pudding every day for a year, so it was time for a change, but I couldn't give up my banana.  The berries seemed a little harsh to me after a short steep, so I let it steep a couple of weeks.  The mix is just perfect for me now.  The berries give a little zing that is much appreciated during the summer, but do not overwhelm the banana.
